dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1968
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Bemoans the destruction and suffering of war and violence. Recaps the resistance of the Catonsville Nine and Milwaukee Fourteen. Shares neighborhood stories and their poverty. Resumes her account of a trip to Mississippi and civil rights accomplishments.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 889 1968-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
